Name of Skill

Software Maintenance Planning
It is the process included in Software Development stage which specifies how users will request modifications or report problem.The budget includes cost and resource estimates.

Classification of Skill

  • It is a Technical Skill as it requires knowledge of various CMMS software, types of maintenance required for the software, Regression Testing.
  • It also requires soft skills like communication.

Prerequisites for Skill

To be good at Maintenance Planning, following things should be needed:

  1. Should have proper knowledge about maintenance types.
    • Corrective Maintenance
    • Adaptive Maintenance
    • Perfective Maintenance
    • Preventive Maintenance
  2. Should have knowledge about the maintenance cost estimation.
  3. Learn various maintenance tools.
  4. Learn various Maintenance softwares.
    • CMMS (Computerized Maintenance Management System)

      It maintains a database of information about an organization's maintenance operations.

    • EAM (Enterprise Asset Management)

      It collects and analyzes data for physical assets during all phases of the asset lifecycle, including the acquisition, maintenance, and disposal phase.

    • Work order management software

      is a kind of database for work orders, facilities requests, and action plan

    • Inventory management software

      It is a digital system that stores data on parts and supplies, enabling real-time insights on quantities and fulfillment needs.

  5. Communication skill to communicate effectively with all levels of the organization.
  6. Ability to work in a self-directed manner and provide direction to others.
  7. Ability to recognize opportunities for process improvements and assist with implementing them.
  8. Traits that every Maintenance Planner must have:

Related Software Engineering Area(s)

  1. Software Testing
  2. Software Development
  3. Software Construction
